INSERT INTO finance.transactions (
  transaction_at,
  date,
  merchant_name,
  amount,
  currency,
  category,
  notes,
  is_recurring,
  client_id
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.transaction_at }}'::timestamptz,
  finance.to_business_date('{{ $json.transaction_at }}'::timestamptz),
  '{{ $json.source }}',
  {{ $json.amount }},
  '{{ $json.currency }}',
  '{{ $json.category }}',
  {{ $json.notes ? "'" + $json.notes + "'" : "NULL" }},
  {{ $json.is_recurring ? 'true' : 'false' }},
  {{ $json.client_id ? "'" + $json.client_id + "'" : "NULL" }}
)
ON CONFLICT (client_id) DO NOTHING
RETURNING *;

=SELECT ops.enqueue_dead_letter(
  'nexus-income',
  'Validate Input',
  '/webhook/nexus-income',
  '{{ ($json.error || $json.message || "Unknown parse error").replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '',
  '',
  '{{ JSON.stringify($('Validate Input').item.json).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
  3
) as dlq_id;
